thread.section_title: Terrass'' Hotel by MH - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent
thread.title_full: Excellent - Review of Terrass'' Hotel by MH, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Adybeig
title: Excellent
text:
I stayed one night at the Terrass hotel and it met my expectations.
Pros:
-very polite , professional staff
I would like to give special thanks to Mr. Baboucarr for his kind help in managing my arrival disappointment in a very professional way, i.e. Upgrade my room to "the Terrass penthouse".
-penthouse: clean,neat, modern with awesome city view.
-location:excellent
Highly recommended...
Room Tip: Room with Eiffel view See more room tips
